antispam_buy_service:
You can easily buy and enable the service
by clicking the Order link.
antispam_enable_feature:
Attention!!
The Antispam service has not been enabled yet.
antispam_service_desc:
For just 2,00 Euro + VAT/year, the service will be active on all the email addresses of the domain.

AntiSpam: An AntiSpam filter that is constantly updated and is fully configurable, automatically detects any unwanted Emails and marks them as spam.
AntiVirus: The AntiVirus service scans all the outgoing and incoming Emails in all the accounts that you have connected with the domain. Should a virus be detected, any infected emails will be deleted.
im_management_mode_own: Chat within your own domain users
postmaster_add_mismatch_password: Password does not match, please confirm again
postmaster_alias_edit_delete_confirmatio: Removing the last email address from an alias will also delete this alias. Do you want to continue?
postmaster_alias_edit_explain: Here you can add or remove emails to/from an alias, if the last email is removed from the alias, it will be deleted.
postmaster_alias_items_will_be_definitiv: The selected aliases will be permanently deleted !
postmaster_alias_warning_need_name: You need to enter a name for the alias
postmaster_aliases_edit_antispam_explain:
It is possible to configure the Antispam filter for SPAM detection.
  • By selecting the "Custom subject" option, you can add a specific tag to the subject to help you identify spam emails
  • Or you can select "Automatic reject" in order to automatically reject all messages identified as SPAM.
postmaster_aliases_noitem: There are no aliases to display
postmaster_aliases_top_text_visible:
Creating an Alias means creating a fictitious account name and associating it to one or more existing accounts to which the messages received by the alias will be sent.

E.g.: by creating the "information" alias and associating it to the real email accounts info@domainname and sales@domainname the messages sent to the alias information@domainname will be received by info@domainname and by sales@domainname.

The destination email address of the alias does not necessarily need to be associated to the domain.
postmaster_autorespond_edit_explain: Here you can add a new Autoresponder.
postmaster_autorespond_items_will_be_def: The selected Autoresponders will be permanently deleted !
postmaster_autorespond_warning_need_name: Please enter a name for the Autoresponder
postmaster_autoresponds_edit_antispam_ex:
It is possible to configure the Antispam filter for SPAM detection.
  • By selecting the "Custom subject" option, you can add a specific tag to the subject to help you identify spam emails
  • Or you can select "Automatic reject" that allows you to automatically reject all messages identified as SPAM.
postmaster_autoresponds_edit_autoreply_e: With the "Autoreply" option, you can send a default message to the sender.
postmaster_autoresponds_edit_copyto_expl: All emails received by this Autoresponder will also be sent to the 'Copy to' address. You must provide an existing and valid email address.
postmaster_autoresponds_noitem: There are no Autoresponders to display
postmaster_autoresponds_rewrite_envelope:
If the target mailserver checks SPF records, we recommend you to set Change the Envelope-Sender.
If the target mailserver does not check SPF records, we do not recommend you to set Change the Envelope-Sender.
If you are not sure, set Change the Envelope-Sender.
postmaster_autoresponds_top_text_visible: The Autoresponder is the creation of a fictitious account with the only function of sending an automatic message to all incoming emails, which will be addressed and received by a real email address indicated during the creation of the account.
postmaster_cookie_directive_pdf_error: The selected file is not a PDF document
postmaster_defaultmailbox_tooltip_text: You have configured this mailbox as the default mailbox that will receive any mail sent to non-existent email addresses of the domain {domain}. To change this, go either to this user's mailbox edit section or to MANAGE> UNKNOWN MAILBOXES
postmaster_items_will_be_definitively_de: The selected mailboxes will be permanently deleted !
postmaster_mailboxes_add_user_explain: You can create a new user for your domain; complete the email address and choose a password
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_administrators: Here you can manage the administrator permissions for this mailing list (read-only or read-write)
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_advanced_5_ema: The maximum number of forward addresses is reached. The list of addresses has been truncated.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_advanced_need_: You need to enter at least one email address if you want to activate the forward feature
You need to enter a subject in order to activate the Autoreply
You need to enter a message text in order to activate the Autoreply
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_antispam_expla:
It is possible to configure the Antispam filter for SPAM detection.
  • By selecting the "Custom subject" option, you can add a specific tag to the subject to help you identify spam emails
  • By selecting the "Move to SPAM" option, each spam email will automatically be moved to the SPAM folder. These messages are stored for 30 days and then removed
  • The last option you can select is "Automatic reject" that allows you to automatically reject all messages identified as SPAM.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_autoreply_expl: With the "Autoreply" option, you can automatically reply to any new emails.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_backup_explain: The Backup service creates a copy of all incoming emails in an archive that is available to the user.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_backup_status_: The Backup service is disabled for this mailbox
The Backup service is enabled for this mailbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_blacklist_expl:
By using the input field and the list below, you can block email messages sent by a specific sender or by any sender of a specific domain.
The messages received from blocked senders or domains will automatically be deleted without being delivered.

• To block a single sender, you need to enter their full email address, e.g. address@domainname.extension and click on Add to list.
  • If you wish to block a domain, you need to use the * character and then enter the full domain name, e.g. *@domainname.extension and click on Add to list.
  • If you wish to block all the extensions of a domain, replace the extension with a * character, e.g. *@domainname.* and click on Add to list.
  • If you wish to block a specific subdomain of a domain, indicate its complete name, e.g. *@subdomain.domainname.extension or use the * character to block all the subdomains, e.g. *@*.domainname.extension and click on Add to list.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_blacklist_rule: This rule cannot be added as it conflicts with a previous Blacklist / Whitelist entry
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_chat_explain: By enabling the Chat service you allow the user to chat with other domain users.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_chat_notavaila: Service unavailable: this mailbox contains invalid characters not supported by the chat
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_chat_status_of: The Chat service is disabled for this mailbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_chat_status_on: The Chat service is enabled for this mailbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_default_and_di: It is not possible to set-up a disabled account as the predefined account.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_default_explai: Make this mailbox the default mailbox, that will receive any mail from non-existent email addresses of the domain.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_default_off: Leave this mailbox as a standard mailbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_default_on: Make this mailbox the default mailbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_default_status: This mailbox is not the default mailbox of the domain
This mailbox is the default mailbox of the domain
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_disable_explai: You can disable a specific mailbox of the domain. If you do, the user of this mailbox will not receive any messages on this mailbox, nor have access to the Webmail services.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_enable_templat: For this template you can choose to enable Antispam filter settings. If you enable the Antispam filter settings for this template, the following settings will overwrite any Antispam settings configured by the user. If you don't enable the Antispam filter settings, when you apply this template, the users will keep their Antispam settings. Other settings may still be overwritten like Whitelist and Blacklist settings.

For this template you can choose to enable Blacklist settings. If you enable the Blacklist settings for this template, the following settings will overwrite any Blacklist settings configured by the user. If you don't enable the Blacklist settings, when you apply this template, the users will keep their Blacklist settings. Other settings may still be overwritten like Antispam and Whitelist settings.

For this template you can choose to enable Whitelist settings. If you enable the Whitelist settings for this template, the following settings will overwrite any Whitelist settings configured by the user. If you don't enable the Whitelist settings, when you apply this template, the users will keep their Whitelist settings. Other settings may still be overwritten like Antispam and Blacklist settings.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_forward_cancel: Delete the messages sent to the account without sending any notification. Warning: All messages will be removed from the server.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_forward_explai:
If you choose to cancel all incoming messages, they will be permanently lost.
If you choose to forward incoming messages to other email addresses, you can specify up to 5 different addresses, separated by the ',' character.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_forward_keepco: Keep a copy of the forwarded emails in your Inbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_gigamail_expla: The GigaMail service can expand the mail capacity of a mailbox up to 5 GigaMails (1 GigaMail = 5GB) reaching a total capacity of 25GB.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_gigamail_statu: The GigaMail service is disabled for this mailbox
The GigaMail service is enabled for this mailbox
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_managers_expla: Here you can add or remove moderators from the mailing list
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_password_expla:
You cannot use a password that contains any of the following:
  • Login name
  • Domain name
  • A combination of the login and the domain name
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_subscribers_ex: Here you can add or remove subscribers from the mailing list
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_whitelist_expl: Here, you can create a list of emails that will be whitelisted. Each email in this list will be ignored by the Antispam filter.
postmaster_mailboxes_edit_whitelist_rule: Cannot add this Whitelist item as it already exists
postmaster_mailboxes_list_noitem: There are no mailboxes to display
postmaster_mailinglist_add_explain: Here you can create a new mailing list, enter the name of the mailing list and then save, you can add subscribers and change all the options by editing the details of the new mailing list.
postmaster_mailinglist_add_name: Enter the name of the mailing list
postmaster_mailinglist_admin_can_edit: Edit files in the text directory
postmaster_mailinglist_admin_can_view: View the list of subscribers and search
postmaster_mailinglist_admin_list2: (only administrators can subscribe, delete, access to the index etc...)
postmaster_mailinglist_admin_list: Set a specific list of remote administrators
postmaster_mailinglist_archive: Archive all messages of the list
postmaster_mailinglist_confirm_cancel2: Attention: if confirmation of the sender is not requested, it will be possible to force the subscription and cancellation of other users without authorization
postmaster_mailinglist_confirm_cancel: Request confirmation with a reply to the message sent to the subscription address
postmaster_mailinglist_confirm_reply: Request confirmation with a reply to the message sent to the subscription address
postmaster_mailinglist_digest: Set a Digest version of the list (called {listname}-digest@{listdomain}
postmaster_mailinglist_edit_explain: There you can add or remove emails to/from an alias, if the last email is removed from the alias, it will be deleted.
postmaster_mailinglist_edit_mailinglist_: Prefix to display in the header of messages
postmaster_mailinglist_index: Index for online access via ezmlm-cgi
postmaster_mailinglist_items_will_be_def: The selected mailing lists will be deleted!
postmaster_mailinglist_send_moderated: Only those included in the mailing list and the moderator can send messages, approval is required for messages from other senders
postmaster_mailinglist_send_moderator_an: Only moderators can send messages, approval is required for messages from other senders
postmaster_mailinglist_send_moderator_on: Only moderators can send messages, other senders will be rejected
postmaster_mailinglist_send_private: Only those included in the mailing list can send messages, other senders are rejected
postmaster_mailinglist_service_request2: (in addition to {listname}-subscribe, {listname}-unsubscribe etc, users can send commands to {listname}-request)
postmaster_mailinglist_trailer: Include a trailer at the end of each message
postmaster_mailinglists_edit_antispam_ex:
It is possible to configure the Antispam filter for SPAM detection.
  • By selecting the "Custom subject" option, you can add a specific tag to the subject to help you identify spam emails
  • Or you can select "Automatic reject" in order to automatically reject all messages identified as SPAM.
postmaster_mailinglists_manager: Email address of the mailing list moderator:
postmaster_mailinglists_noitem: There are no mailing lists to display
postmaster_mailinglists_top_text_visible:
A Mailing List is a list of e-mail addresses, configured to allow multiple registered users to participate in discussions via email.
It allows users to send simultaneous email messages to all the members of the list, without necessarily knowing the email address of each member.
postmaster_mailinglistscancelled_items_w: The selected mailing lists will be permanently deleted
postmaster_mailinglistscancelled_noitem: There are no deleted Mailing lists to display
postmaster_mailinglistscancelled_top_tex:
A Mailing List is a list of e-mail addresses, usually configured to allow subjects enrolled to participate in discussions via e-mail.
It allows the simultaneous sending of e-mail messages to all members of the list, without necessarily knowing the e-mail address of each member.
postmaster_manage_abook_explain: Here you can give users of your domain access to the corporate Address Book control panel. You can add, delete, or enable/disable access using the interface below
postmaster_manage_abook_feedback_added: Corporate Address Book Admin rights added successfully
postmaster_manage_abook_feedback_disable: Corporate Address Book Admin rights now disabled
postmaster_manage_abook_feedback_enabled: Corporate Address Book Admin rights now enabled
postmaster_manage_abook_feedback_removed: Corporate Address Book Admin rights removed successfully
postmaster_manage_all_added: All the domain users have been added to the chat service
postmaster_manage_all_disabled: All the domain users have been removed from the chat service
postmaster_manage_calendar_color_explain:
Select the color box to choose the background color of the corporate events
All the available colors will be displayed, select the color you prefer
postmaster_manage_calendar_color_select: Select the background color of the corporate calendar event:
postmaster_manage_calendar_explain: Here you can give users of your domain access to the corporate calendar control panel. You can add, delete, or enable/disable access using the interface below

postmaster_manage_calendar_feedback_colo: Corporate calendar background color saved successfully
postmaster_manage_calendar_feedback_disa: Corporate calendar admin rights now disabled
postmaster_manage_calendar_feedback_enab: Corporate calendar admin rights now enabled
postmaster_manage_calendar_feedback_remo: Corporate calendar admin rights removed successfully
postmaster_manage_calendarcatalog_add: Add a new iCal to the list
postmaster_manage_calendarcatalog_confir: This external calendar will be removed
postmaster_manage_calendarcatalog_explai: Here you can add custom public iCal that will be made available to users. You can also see a list of fixed available calendars that are installed by default
postmaster_manage_calendarcatalog_need_n: You need to enter a name for this external calendar
postmaster_manage_calendarcatalog_need_u: You need to enter a URL for this external calendar
postmaster_manage_chat_advanced_disable_: Disable chat for all your domain users
postmaster_manage_chat_advanced_enable_a: Enable chat for all your domain users
postmaster_manage_chat_advanced_explain: Here you can enable/disable the service for all the users. In order to enable individual users, simply use the edit user feature in the mailbox admin pages
postmaster_manage_chat_detail_all: All your domain users have access to the chat
postmaster_manage_chat_detail_none: No domain users have access to the chat
postmaster_manage_chat_detail_notall: You have {im_count} domain users out of {domain_count} with access to the chat
postmaster_manage_chat_explain: You can enable the chat service for your domain; this service allows your users to communicate with other users of your domain.
postmaster_manage_customization_explain:
You can change the look of your webmail:
  • Add your own logo image
  • Choose the main color (used as background color for the buttons)
  • Choose the selection color (used when you select items in the menus and the lists, or when you hover over them)
  • Choose the button hover color (used when you hover over a button)
postmaster_manage_defaultmailbox_explain: Here you can configure how messages addressed to non-existent mailboxes are handled. You can either return the emails to the sender, delete them, deliver them to a local mailbox or forward them to an external email address.
postmaster_manage_defaultmailbox_forward: Forward to an other email address
postmaster_manage_defaultmailbox_please_: Please select a mailbox in the list
Please enter a valid email address
postmaster_manage_mailadmin_explain: Here you can grant access to the postmaster administration panel to certain users of your domain. You can add, delete, or enable/disable access using the interface below
postmaster_template_add_explain: Here you can create a new template; you can configure the Antispam filter and any Whitelist/Blacklist associated with this template. Once this template is configured, it can then be applied to the user's settings
postmaster_template_apply_feedback: Template applied successfully to all domain users
postmaster_template_apply_question: You are about to apply this template to all the domain users. Depending on what you configured, Antispam, Whitelist and Blacklist settings of all users may be overwritten. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue and apply this template ?
postmaster_template_edit_antispam_explai:
It is possible to configure the Antispam filter for SPAM detection.
  • By selecting the "Custom subject" option, you can add a specific tag to the subject to help you identify spam emails
  • By selecting the "Move to SPAM" option, all spam will automatically be moved to the SPAM folder. These messages are stored for 30 days and then removed
  • The last option you can select is "Automatic reject" that allows you to automatically reject all messages identified as SPAM.
postmaster_template_edit_explain: Here you can configure a template, select Antispam settings, Whitelist and Blacklist options.
postmaster_template_items_will_be_defini: The selected template will be permanently deleted !
postmaster_template_warning_need_name: Please enter a name for the alias
postmaster_template_will_be_definitively: This template will be permanently deleted.
postmaster_templates_noitem: There are no templates to display
postmaster_templates_top_text_visible:
The "Edit Template" option, reserved only for postmaster mailboxes, allows you to create a template.
The model provides rules and functions to be applied to all mailboxes or to those that the Postmaster chooses, each model will feature 3 "Spam", "White list" and "Black list" filters.
postmaster_user_general_mailbox_default: Make this mailbox the default mailbox
userprofile_apply_tpl_text: Would you like to apply the ${template} template for the ${account} account?
userprofile_create_with_template: Apply antispam, whitelist and blacklist settings from this template:
userprofile_im_may_enable: IM is available, you can activate it from the Email Account Management page
